milestones.title: Reached 100 followers on Open Source Queens
milestones.description: I decided to start this group on daily.dev after noticing that women and non-binary in the open source community were not be acknowledged for their contributions

milestones.title: Accepted into FreeCodeCamp's Writing Team
milestones.description: I was picked out of a small percentage of applicants for writing engaging and humorous posts
